remarks: Alternate deduction version of ~ fvmpt , suitable for iteration. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2017.)
statement:
fvmptdv2.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. D ) $.
fvmptdv2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B e. V ) $.
fvmptdv2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x = A ) -> B = C ) $.
fvmptdv2 $p |- ( ph -> ( F = ( x e. D |-> B ) -> ( F ` A ) = C ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d ph x $.
